Chapter 3 Data Types 3.1 1D 3.1.1 Homogenoues 3.1.1.1 Vectors R has no scalars, only vectors. A scalar is a vector of length 1 3.1.2 Heterogenous 3.1.2.1 Lists 3.2 2D 3.2.1 Homogenoues 3.2.1.1 Matrices 3.2.1.1.0.1 Create a matrix The matrix is filled first down the columns To create a matrix you can give it the numbers and then provide the dimensions ## [,1] [,2] [,3] ## [1,] 1 5 9 ## [2,] 2 6 10 ## [3,] 3 7 11 ## [4,] 4 8 12 ## [,1] [,2] ## [1,] 5 9 ## [2,] 6 10 ## [1] 5 6 7 8 ## [,1] ## [1,] 5 ## [2,] 6 ## [3,] 7 ## [4,] 8 3.2.2 Heterogenous 3.2.2.1 Data frames Data frames are lists 3.3 nd 3.3.1 Homogenoues 3.3.1.1 Arrays
